SELECT
LASTWITHTIME(errorClassName, "timestamp", 'STRING') as "mostRecentErrorClass", LASTWITHTIME( , "timestamp", 'STRING') as "mostRecentErrorMessage", count(*) as "count", FIRSTWITHTIME("timestamp", "timestamp", 'LONG') as "firstOccurred", LASTWITHTIME("timestamp", "timestamp", 'LONG') as "lastOccurred"
